markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Duskwalker](/Rules.aspx?ID=1425)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 29 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
A duskwalker isn't born; they are instead created, each manifesting as a mortal child in a location with close ties to death. They embody the somber powers of the [psychopomps](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=83), immortal guardians and shepherds of the dead, and they maintain a fascination with and deep understanding of death throughout their lives. More singular than other versatile heritages, duskwalkers don't have different lineages.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Duskwalker
search_markdown:

</additional-info>
